DOC.detailed_description: Background/Rationale : In 2005 report 'From Cancer Patient Cancer Survivor : Lost Transition ' , Institute Medicine recommend cancer patient complete treatment receive summary care receive plan outline follow-up care need . Taken together material refer 'Survivorship Care Plan ' , SCPs . Based recommendation IOM , number organization develop survivorship care plan templates . Two template , 'Survivorship Care Plan Builder ' 'My Care Plan , ' develop Journey Forward , collaboration among National Coalition Cancer Survivorship , UCLA Cancer Survivorship Center , Oncology Nursing Society , WellPoint , Inc. , Genentech ( http : //journeyforward.org/ ) . These tool available free charge wish use . As time effort require complete SCP document find barrier implementation , study aim explore use two tool . Research Questions : 1 . What process undertaken implement survivorship care plan ? - How process differ patient-initiated My Care Plan provider-initiated Survivorship Care Plan Builder ? 2 . What feasibility implement survivorship care plan ? - Does feasibility differ patient-initiated My Care Plan provider-initiated Survivorship Care Plan Builder ? 3 . What value survivorship care plan patient provider ? - Does value differ patient-initiated My Care Plan provider-initiated Survivorship Care Plan Builder ? Study Design : This pilot randomize study . Cancer patient complete acute treatment participate provider randomize either patient-initiated My Care Plan tool provider-initiated Survivorship Care Plan Builder . The investigator describe compare tool implement practice , feasibility complete tool , value tool patient provider . The study use quantitative qualitative measure implementation , feasibility , value .
